# `ConversationContentListPickerItem` Definition

Represents a selectable item in a list picker.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Unique identifier for the list picker item |
| title | `string` | No | The main text displayed for the item. |
| subtitle | `string` | No | Additional text providing more details about the item. |
| imageUrl | `string` | No | URL of an image to be displayed alongside the item. |
